info.title: Debit/Credit Indicator CO - Read
info.description: The service contains the controlling debit credit code and controlling debit credit code text nodes.

x-sap-shortText: Read debit/credit information using this inbound service

values.text: SAP Analytics Cloud for Planning Integration(SAP_COM_0087)
